name: In re Adoption of Heather M. CARNEY. Appeal of Timothy L. CARNEY

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re Adoption of Heather M. CARNEY. Appeal of Timothy L. CARNEY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Westmoreland County is affirmed. Each party is to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward J. Bilik, Loughran, Mlakar & Bilik, Greensburg, court-appointed for appellant.
Donald R. Rigone, Fisher, Long & Rigone, Greensburg, for Diane Louise Mundt and William John Mundt.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 213
In re Adoption of Heather M. CARNEY. Appeal of Timothy L. CARNEY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 2, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Edward J. Bilik, Loughran, Mlakar & Bilik, Greensburg, court-appointed for appellant.
Donald R. Rigone, Fisher, Long & Rigone, Greensburg, for Diane Louise Mundt and William John Mundt.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
